text: René Féret (26 May 1945 - 28 April 2015) was a French actor, screenwriter, movie director and producer.Le cinéaste René Féret est mort He was known for his movie Solemn Communion. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French movie producers Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie actors Category:People from Nord
title: René Féret
